casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Alexander C. POLKE. No. 412A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 8, 2005. Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State of NC.

*736The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th day of August 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time to Serve Proposed Record on Appeal:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant shall have up to and including the 8th day of September 2005 to serve his/her proposed record upon the district attorney. The parties shall then proceed to settle and file the record on appeal pursuant to the provisions of Appellate Rules 11 and 12. By order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of August 2005."
